trans-unit.source: Represents the drawing properties of the 3D border skin.
trans-unit.target: 表示立體框線外觀的繪圖屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線外觀框架的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background gradient style of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線外觀框架的背景漸層樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background hatch style of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線外觀框架的背景影線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線外觀框架的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="string" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image alignment of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線外觀框架的背景影像對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackImageAlignment%2A> property is used by <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled> drawing mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackImageAlignment%2A>屬性供<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled>繪圖模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color that is replaced with a transparent color when the background image of a border skin frame is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繪製框線外觀框架的背景影像時，會以透明色彩取代的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線外觀框架背景影像的繪製模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary background color of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線外觀框架的次要背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This color is combined with the primary background color, which is set with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackColor%2A> property, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackHatchStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackGradientStyle%2A> properties are used.
trans-unit.target: 此色彩會結合主要的背景色彩，它會設定與<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackColor%2A>屬性，當<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackHatchStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackGradientStyle%2A>可用屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線外觀框架的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the border line of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線外觀框架的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the border line of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線外觀框架的框線寬度。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page color of a border skin.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線外觀的頁面色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of a border skin.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線外觀的樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkinStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkinStyle" /> 列舉值。
